name: cai-clipboard-action-intelligence
title: Cai: Clipboard Action Intelligence
description: A privacy-friendly, AI-powered clipboard assistant that analyzes copied content and suggests intelligent actions using locally-run language models, ensuring all data remains on-device and secure.
author: soyasis

commands.name: smart-paste
commands.title: Smart Paste
commands.subtitle: Get smart actions for clipboard content
commands.description: Analyzes your clipboard content and suggests relevant actions like creating calendar events, opening maps, translating, summarizing, and more

commands.name: smart-select
commands.title: Smart Select
commands.subtitle: Get smart actions for selected text
commands.description: Analyzes selected text and suggests relevant actions like creating calendar events, opening maps, translating, summarizing, and more

preferences.name: llmProvider
preferences.title: LLM Provider
preferences.description: Select your local LLM provider or choose Custom for other OpenAI-compatible servers

preferences.name: llmCustomUrl
preferences.title: Custom LLM Server URL
preferences.description: Only used if 'Custom' is selected above. Must be OpenAI-compatible API endpoint.

preferences.name: llmModel
preferences.title: Model Name (optional)
preferences.description: Specific model to use. Leave empty to use server's default/loaded model.

preferences.name: preferredSearchEngine
preferences.title: Preferred Search Engine
preferences.description: Which search engine to use for web searches

preferences.name: preferredMaps
preferences.title: Preferred Maps App
preferences.description: Which maps app to open addresses in

preferences.name: translationLanguage1
preferences.title: Translation Language 1
preferences.description: First preferred language for quick translations

preferences.name: translationLanguage2
preferences.title: Translation Language 2
preferences.description: Second preferred language for quick translations

preferences.name: customActionPrompt
preferences.title: Custom Action Prompt (⌘1)
preferences.description: Your custom AI instruction (e.g., 'Proofread selected text', 'Create email reply', 'Count words', 'convert to python list'). Always accessible via ⌘1

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
